sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_bbs_category ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(64) not null, userid char(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, lasttopicid char(32), lastpostid char(32), topics int not null, posts int not null, iconclass varchar(32), description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(name), unique(parentid, text), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_bbs_topic ( id char(32) not null, categoryid char(32) not null, status tinyint not null, bbstype tinyint not null, askstatus tinyint not null, topic varchar(128) not null, createdate datetime not null, userid char(32) not null, posts int not null, recommendation int not null, recommendationdate datetime, recommendationduration int not null, best bit not null, contentmark int not null, lastpostdate datetime not null, lastuserid char(32), favorites int not null, views int not null, description varchar(256), content text not null, oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_bbs_post ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), contentid char(32) not null, replyid char(32), replies int not null, votes int not null, bestanswer bit not null, createdate datetime not null, userid char(32) not null, comment text not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_bbs_team ( id char(32) not null, ownerid char(32) not null, role varchar(32), createdate datetime not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id), unique(ownerid, userid, role) );
create table sf_bbs_user ( id char(32) not null, topics int not null, posts int not null, lasttopicid char(32), lastpostid char(32), primary key(id) );

create table sf_bbs_ask_vote ( id char(32) not null, postid char(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id), unique(postid, userid) );
